name: Tenebrous Spell
text: You blend shadow into your spells, increasing their efficacy at the price of susceptibility to light.
benefit:
When you cast a tenebrous spell in darkness or dim light, the spell’s effective caster level and any associated save DCs are increased by 1. Any attempts at dispelling a tenebrous spell in darkness or dim light take a –2 penalty on the dispel check.

Casting a tenebrous spell in bright light is difficult, and requires a concentration check (DC 15 + twice the tenebrous spell’s effective spell level). Attempts to dispel a tenebrous spell in bright light gain a +4 bonus on the dispel check.

You cannot use this feat on spells with the light descriptor. A tenebrous spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell’s actual level, except in the case of spells with the darkness or shadow descriptor or of the illusion (shadow) subschool; this feat does not change the effective level of those spells (but still counts as using a metamagic feat for all other purposes).
text_zh: 你能够将阴影融入你的法术，以法术变得易受光线影响为代价增强法术。
benefit_zh:
当你在黑暗（darkness）或者昏暗（dim）光照中施放晦暗法术时，法术的有效施法者等级（effective caster level）以及任何与之相关的豁免DC增加1点。任何在黑暗（darkness）或者昏暗（dim）光照中解除（dispelling）晦暗法术的尝试均会在解除检定（dispel check）中受到-2减值。

在明亮（bright）光照中施放晦暗法术十分困难，需要进行专注检定（DC 15 + 两倍晦暗法术的有效法术等级）。任何在明亮（bright）光照中解除晦暗法术的尝试均会在解除检定中获得+4加值。

你无法将该专长应用到带有光亮描述符（light descriptor）的法术上。晦暗法术占用高于原本法术等级1级的法术位，不过对于带有黑暗（darkness）或阴影（shadow）描述符，或者幻术系（幽影幻觉，shadow）的法术来说，该专长不会提升这些法术所需要占用的法术位（但是仍旧在其他方面视为使用了超魔专长）。
